summary: REQ-23/24/25 appear largely implemented: registration success triggers a best-effort top-level redirect to the exact WhatsApp URL; success/duplicate UIs no longer show WhatsApp join buttons/copy; the floating CTA now shows the visible label text "Join WhatsApp group" and opens the exact invite link. One acceptance criterion (non-overlap with submit button on common mobile viewports) is not verifiable from the diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Floating CTA remains positioned bottom-right, does not overlap the primary form submit button on common mobile viewports, and remains clickable.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows bottom-right fixed positioning and sizing classes, but provides no viewport/layout evidence demonstrating it does not overlap the registration form submit button on common mobile viewports.
